document.full_text: detectives believe they have uncovered more victims of a los angeles serial killer dubbed the "grim sleeper" who is already accused of 10 murders, police said on tuesday.
document.title: accused "grim sleeper" killer suspected in more deaths
lines_and_colors: detectives believe they have uncovered more victims of a los angeles serial killer dubbed the "grim sleeper" who is already accused of 10 murders, police said on tuesday.
